title: Old Pantheon bug is back
body:
The bug: After using W, Pantheon won't be able to use any more abilities again (including recall) until using his W once more.

This happened to me yesterday after an ult/ stun/ Q on an enemy ziggs under his tower. I freaked out and ran when I realised I was bugged instead of lasthitting the Ziggs. Couldn't recall or anything. Tried reconnecting etc. Eventually by chance I stunned a minion a few minutes later and it got things working again.

From the replay below, right after I landed on the Ziggs & stunned/ speared (at 0:12 in the video), I wasn't able to use any abilities after that.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VEHs1Hc0EVU

I experienced this bug on Pantheon in the past, season 6 or 5, and even before that I think.

Here's a forum post from 2014 complaining about it http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1658505

I thought it was gone from the game but seems like it's back with the recent patch?

Have seen others complaining about it here which confirms it's not just me
https://www.reddit.com/r/PantheonMains/comments/5uzve1/bug_huge_bug_with_pantheon_right_now/

replies.body: If my theory is right, fixed for 7.5
Fixed for 7.5? what.... so he is just going to have this bug whole patch. Isn't this like a disable panth worth bug.. If it happens if your like jungling/in fight could be very sad ;c
